thread.title: Cathy Brewer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Cathy Brewer

author: Cathy Brewer
title: Cathy Brewer
text:
I had two tires that needed to be replaced on my commerical vehicle that I use for work.
William gave me prompt, courteous attention every step of the way.
He had the tires ordered and got me on my way.
William did an excellent job and I highly recommend Town Fair Tire because of him!
